Request for assistancePartnersInWealth EMail I would like to request your assistance in locating an employee to meet our growing needs We have an immediate opening for a Manager of Marketing Attached you will find a detailed description of the position If you can think of anyone that might meet these requirements we would appreciate your sending them our way Also please feel free to forward this email to anyone that you believe may help us in our search Thank you We really appreciate your consideration Sincerely James R Waters CFP PARTNERSINWEALTH Bissonnet Suite Houston TX phone fax wwwpartnersinwealthcom atthtm CAREER OPPORTUNITYdoc atteml
